Purpose: Tall infographic or diagram, explains a process, system, or concept visually

Character.Description: A highly competent, focused woman coder and systems thinker

Base.Name: Dark blazer
Base.Description: Professional dark blazer over tech-casual attire, sleeves often pushed up
Base.Context: Always present, bridges corporate and technical worlds

Situational.Name: Professional glasses
Situational.Description: Modern rectangular frames, subtle tech integration

Style.Genre: Cyberpunk / Tech Noir with Infographic Elements
Style.Rendering: High-detail digital painting with clean graphic overlays, concept art quality

ColorPalette.Treatment: Clear color coding for diagram elements, consistent visual hierarchy

CompositionNotes.Framing: Full figure or 3/4 figure, vertical space for diagram elements
CompositionNotes.SubjectPlacement: Character to one side, diagram elements flowing vertically
CompositionNotes.DepthOfField: Deep, all elements should be readable
CompositionNotes.Layout: Clear visual flow from top to bottom, numbered or connected elements

DiagramTypes.Name: Process Flow
DiagramTypes.Description: Character beside or within a vertical flowchart
DiagramTypes.Example: Development workflow from idea to deployment

DiagramTypes.Name: Hierarchy
DiagramTypes.Description: Character presenting layered or nested concepts

DiagramTypes.Name: System Map
DiagramTypes.Description: Character within or explaining an interconnected system

UseCases.Name: Concept Explanation
UseCases.Description: Breaking down a complex idea into visual steps
UseCases.CharacterRole: Presenter/guide pointing to or interacting with elements

UseCases.Name: Before/After
UseCases.CharacterRole: Standing between states, gesturing to contrast

UseCases.Name: Mental Model
UseCases.Description: Illustrating how to think about something

optimistic.DiagramStyle: Green accents for positive outcomes, open structures

analytical.DiagramStyle: Blue/cyan dominant, precise lines, labeled clearly

frustrated.DiagramStyle: Tangled elements, blocked paths, warning indicators

contemplative.DiagramStyle: Organic connections, flowing rather than rigid
